content: My name is Haoyu Wang from China.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Peter Schmidt from Germany.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of this conversation was the rental price of an apartment in Duisburg.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If no, why did you not agree on a final price?
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] We did not agree on a final price because the landlord, Peter Schmidt, was looking for a higher price than the offers I made. I started with an offer of 500 euros per month, and my final offer was 750 euros per month, but he still wanted a higher price.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner, Peter Schmidt, as 8.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If no, why did you not feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I did not feel discriminated or offended because the conversation was focused on the negotiation process. The landlord, Peter Schmidt, maintained a professional and respectful demeanor throughout the negotiation.
name: Haoyu Wang
